name: Toasty Coasty
description:
How to play:
Steer your sled around the racetrack, picking up handwarmers as you drift along. The more handwarmers you acquire, the faster your sled will go. But be warned! Your supply will decrease over time, or if you hit the obstacles on the track. Maintain the highest score you can until you've completed all 3 laps.

Made by csswift & Reeds for Mini-Jam 124 in 2 days.
